name: terminii
overview:
terminii - Appointment booking and management

terminii offers easy to use, web-based appointment management services for small and medium-sized companies. terminii Appliactions are available as a free stand-alone version and in various packages for professional use.

On top of terminii Base! - the core Application - terminii also offers Extensions for more specific needs and branches:

terminii Go! - Pay-per-lead appointment service

With terminii Go! requests and bookings can be adressed to a service company through internet directory services such as Yellow pages. Bookings and requests are directly incorporated into terminii Base!. terminii Live! - Real Time appointment requests allows the user to sent appointment requests to multiple service providers simultaneously and in real time. The appointments are awarded on a first-come, first-serve principle.

terminii Personal - the private family calendar Similar to the business calendar, our private live requires scheduling. terminii Personal enables the user’s to connects search for services and inquire directly from terminii Personal. The basic features of temrinii Base! are incorporated in this private version.
